result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Status conference on December 5, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on October 10, 2022 at 11:00 am.
No Waiver of Preliminary held DNA databank emailed notified of error.

02:37 PM  Defendant Keith C Packard in court with attorney Chelsea M. Payant.  Kelly L. Hays appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case and reviews.  Attorney Payant makes statement and will file to withdraw from case due to conflict.  Court schedules a Status Conference on 6/6/22 at 1:00pm.  Court is adjurned.  Status hearing scheduled for June 6, 2022 at 11:00 am. (this hearing was not called as a waiver)

Waiver of Prelim on April 26, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Notice went to Atty Payant because appeared with defendant.

02:27 PM Defendant Keith C Packard in court with attorney Chelsea M. Payant.  Kelly L Hays appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Payant has copy of complaint, waives reading, bond set and waives time limits for p.h. State address bond modification no violent or abusive contact with victim. Atty Payant is joining. Court modifies no contact provision to no violent or abusive contact with victim. Def. waives time limits for p.h. Court accepts waiver of time limits for p.h.  Waiver of Prelim scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Copy of minutes given to LCSD

ADDRESS INFO for Keith C Packard
Current: N3441 N Langlade Road, Antigo, WI 54409 United States  (Effective: 03-07-2022)
Prior: 3441 N Langlade Road, Antigo, WI 54409 (This address was given when criminal complaint filed on 3-28-22.)

3-7-22
State of WI vs. Keith Clarence Packard
Brent DeBord, CC
ADA Kelly Hays, In court
Keith C. Packard, in custody via zoom, Chelsea Payant appears special today. 

Court calls @ 1:24 p.m. 
State ask court to complete riverside hearing and set bond today.
Possible charges Strangulation, DC. Domestic, & Bail jumping 
State gives facts for probable cause.
Court finds probable cause and will proceed.
State gives bail/bond recommendation and request $2,000 cash bond with conditions no contact with victim. No presence in establishments with Class B liquor license.  Maintain Absolute Sobriety.
Atty Payant gives bail/bond recommendation. 
Court orders $1,200 cash bond  - no contact with victim or victims residence. No presence in establishments with Class B liquor license.  Maintain Absolute Sobriety
Atty Payant heard RE: law enforcement to get personal belonging
Victim is now present via zoom and makes statement
Init 3-28 @ 1:30 p.m.
